page.title: 14Traditional food.
page.content: My Mum makes{pasties}every Wednesday. Sometimes I help.First I roll the pastry into a circle.Then I chop potatoes,turnip and onions and put it into the centre.I add steak plus salt and pepper.I fold the pastry and crimp the edges and bake for 1 hr. For dessert we have{Clotted Cream}with fruit.To make cream,gently heat milk until the cream makes a skin.When cool skim it off.I like{Saffron buns}which are made with yeast,saffron,flour and dried fruit.{Potato cake}is made with mashed potato,flour,suet and fruit. {Cornish stew}is made by chopping meat, potato,onion and turnip.Simmer for 2 hrs.and add dumplings.{Heavy cake}has plain flour,dried fruit,sugar and fat. Mix with eggs and milk and roll out.Bake for 40 mins in a moderate oven.We also eat{Cornish Gingerbread biscuits and{Smoked Mackerel.
